@notice Return the `position`th slot of the `node`,
 treating `node` as a uint32[32].
nodes.name: getSlot

nodes.documentation: @notice Return `node` with the `position`th slot set to zero.

setSlot

nodes.documentation: @notice Calculate the summed weight of all slots in the `node`.
nodes.name: sumWeight
pickWeightedSlot
Branch
slotShift

nodes.documentation:
@notice Return the `position`th slot of the `node`,
 treating `node` as a uint32[32].
nodes.name: getSlot

nodes.documentation: @notice Return `node` with the `position`th slot set to zero.
nodes.name: clearSlot
setSlot

nodes.documentation: @notice Calculate the summed weight of all slots in the `node`.
nodes.name: sumWeight
pickWeightedSlot

userdoc.notice: The implicit 8-ary trees of the sortition pool rely on packing 8 "slots" of 32-bit values into each uint256. The Branch library permits efficient calculations on these slots.
